Sentencas: Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cell (PEMFC) and Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) are two important Distributed Generations (DGs) which are placed usually in microgrids.
Titulo: Improving the performance of proton exchange membrane and solid oxide fuel cells under voltage flicker using Fuzzy-PI controller

Sentencas: Microgrids are often connected to distribution networks with high probability of different voltage disturbances due to their weakness.
Titulo: Improving the performance of proton exchange membrane and solid oxide fuel cells under voltage flicker using Fuzzy-PI controller

Sentencas: In this paper, performances of both grid-connected DGs are improved under Voltage Flicker (VF).
Titulo: Improving the performance of proton exchange membrane and solid oxide fuel cells under voltage flicker using Fuzzy-PI controller

Sentencas: The conventional PI controller of both DGs is decoupled into d-axis and q-axis controllers based on steadiness of grid-voltage to ease the control strategy, which is not valid in the case of VF.
Titulo: Improving the performance of proton exchange membrane and solid oxide fuel cells under voltage flicker using Fuzzy-PI controller

Sentencas: As numerical analyses depicted, SOFC DG shows a considerable nonlinear oscillation in its output power under slightly high amplitude VFs while PEMFC DG does not show any significant nonlinearity oscillation.
Titulo: Improving the performance of proton exchange membrane and solid oxide fuel cells under voltage flicker using Fuzzy-PI controller

Sentencas: To improve the performances of both DGs under VF, a Fuzzy-PI controller is proposed, while to mitigate the nonlinearity effect of SOFC a small supercapacitor is also suggested which shows satisfactory results.
Titulo: Improving the performance of proton exchange membrane and solid oxide fuel cells under voltage flicker using Fuzzy-PI controller

Sentencas: Different VFs are imposed to the grid-voltage in numerical studies.
Titulo: Improving the performance of proton exchange membrane and solid oxide fuel cells under voltage flicker using Fuzzy-PI controller

Sentencas: Also, an oscillatory transient is imposed to the grid-voltage to evaluate the performance of the proposed controllers under a typical transient disturbance.
Titulo: Improving the performance of proton exchange membrane and solid oxide fuel cells under voltage flicker using Fuzzy-PI controller

Sentencas: Numerical results demonstrate the efficacy of the proposed controller in comparison with PI controller for both DGs.
Titulo: Improving the performance of proton exchange membrane and solid oxide fuel cells under voltage flicker using Fuzzy-PI controller
